Row.Text: 'Alim
A Great Person with one charge. Can only be trained in Cities with an Ulema, and the specific 'Alim received is random. Each 'Alim can only be received once. Cost increases per 'Alim trained.
Al-Jahiz
Create a Menagerie in a City. This Menagerie receives +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Tile must have less than 2 Buildings and the City cannot have a Menagerie.
Al-Khwarizmi
Activate on a completed Ulema. Each Building in this Quarter receives +3[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science.
Ibn Sina
Create a Hospital in a City. This Hospital receives +2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. Tile must have less than 2 Buildings and the City cannot have a Hospital.
Al-Maqdisi
Activate in another Civilization. Receive 50[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every Improved Resource tile this Settlement has. (On Standard Speed)
Al-Farghani
Create an Observatory in a City. This Observatory receives +2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. Tile must have less than 2 Buildings and the City cannot have an Observatory.
Al-Farabi
Activate on a Science building. Receive a free random unlocked Technology.
Rabia of Basra
Activate on a Happiness building. +10%[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in this Settlement.
Al-Shaybani
Activate on a Culture building. Receive an additional Social Policy slot.
Al-Jazari
Activate on a District with at least 1 Specialist Limit, this tile gets +1 Specialists. 2 charges.
Ibn Fadlan
Activate on a Navigable River. Receive 50[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence for every tile of this River. (On Standard Speed)
Conquistador

A Great Person with one charge. Can only be trained in Cities with a Wharf, and the specific Conquistador received is random. Each Conquistador can only be received once and can only be activated in Distant Lands. Cost increases per Conquistador trained. Can always Embark in Ocean.
Ferdinand Magellan
Activate in Distant Lands on a Fleet Commander, this Unit receives +2 movement and +2 sight.
Francisco Pizarro
Activate in Distant Lands on an Army Commander with 3 empty slots. This commander receives 2 Infantry Units and 1 Cavalry Unit.
Juan Ponce de León
Activate in Distant Lands on any Water tile. +1 movement for Treasure Convoys.
Christopher Columbus
Activate in Distant Lands on any Water tile. Reveals the map except for the interior of Distant Lands.
Hernán Cortés
Activate in Distant Lands on an Army Commander with 3 empty slots. This commander receive 3 Infantry Units.
Hernando de Soto
Activate in Distant Lands on a tile owned by an Independent Power. This Independent Power becomes a City-State with you as the Suzerain.
Francisco de Orellana
Activate in Distant Lands on a Navigable River. Receive 50[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every tile of this River. (On Standard Speed)
Álvar Núñez Cabeza de Vaca
Activate in Distant Lands on or adjacent to a Natural Wonder. Gain 200[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for each Natural Wonder tile here or adjacent. (On Standard Speed)
Miguel López de Legazpi
Activate in Distant Lands on an Army Commander with 3 empty slots. This commander receives 2 Ranged Units and 1 Infantry Unit.
Inés Suárez
Activate in Distant Lands on an eligible Settlement location. This creates a new Town.
